find_sim_images module

Command-line interface for the Image Similarity Search system.

This script allows users to perform actions like building a FAISS index from a folder of images, or searching for similar images to a given query image.

It prioritizes command-line arguments, falls back to a YAML configuration file (default: no_gui_app/configs/image_similarity_config.yaml), and errors if required parameters are missing.

find_sim_images.main()[source]
